prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Philip Morin Freneau, Accession #7592 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on June 10, 1964.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a printed biographical sketch from "The Poets and Poetry of America"; and a letter to an unidentified correspondent requesting travel information and payment for printing materials.
Needs payment from Mr. Wilson for printing materials. Mentions Mr. Saunders. Requests travel information from Joe Newton.

did.unittitle: Bio. sketch printed. Page from The Poets and Poetry of America. n.d.
